name: Climb To Capital
description:
You're an entrepreneur who has recently discovered a mysterious boy living in a glass staircase that creates butterflies with his eyes. Sensing an opportunity to make money,  you prepare to climb up the staircase to catch him.

Use 'WASD' to move and space to jump. Left click to raise your shield. 

Time is money and your life. Reach the butterfly boy before it runs out.

-------

Ashanti - UI, Art 

Aaliyah - Gameplay, Juice 

Tim - Gameplay
